New Records: Boston Celtics tied the franchise record for made 3’s in a half
Boston Celtics tied the NBA record for total made 3’s in a game
Boston Celtics broke the record for 3’s on opening night
Key Match Events: Boston took a massive 43-24 lead at the end of the 1st quarter
Jayson Tatum finished with 37 points and 10 assists
Derrick White scored 24 points with six 3’s
Boston's defensive gameplan effectively limited the Knicks' offensive options
Pre-Game Insights: The energy of the ring/banner raising ceremony was incredible
The Knicks saw this as a clear opportunity to make a statement
Post-Match Reflections: The Celtics' defensive execution was praised
Jaylen Brown's defensive improvement was highlighted
Jrue Holiday's adaptability and sacrifice were noted
Miscellaneous Highlights: Boston's 3PT hunting and proficiency has made watching every other team less enjoyable in comparison
The Celtics finished just one 3-pointer away from claiming the NBA record for most made 3’s in a single game
